DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study ass whether increase risk sepsis use telmisartan compare ARBs major antihypertensive class , include ACEIs , beta-blockers , CCBs thiazide diuretic . A secondary objective ass whether use ARBs ACEIs , compare three major antihypertensive class untreated hypertension , associate increase risk sepsis . A third objective evaluate whether use telmisartan compare ARBs , ACEIs major antihypertensive class associate increase risk worse outcome due sepsis , particular acute kidney injury death
DOC.criteria: Patients , 18 year old , least twoyear followup United Kingdom 's general practice research database ( GPRD ) , diagnosis treatment hypertension Sepsis , chronic renal failure dialysis twoyear period prior cohort entry
